title: smartflower solar device blooms like a flower and turns with the sun
text:
smartflower solar device blooms like a flower and turns with the sun mar 22, 2017 smartflower solar device blooms like a flower and turns with the sun 
the smartflower all-in-one solar system gives flower power a literal sense with its botanical-influenced concept. the ‘plug-&-play’ hoome applicance, dubbed the smartflower POP, is a photovoltaic system that takes the form of a flower, with solar panel ‘petals’ that automatically unfurl when the sun rises in the morning. the device directs it’s 18 M2 solar modular fan towards the sun and begins producing electricity to power your hot shower, coffee machine, and breakfast radio. thanks to dual-axle sun tracking, the fan mores reliably along with the sun throughout the day. beatrice murray-nag I designboom
